1.name: 除魔
1.des: 前往猪魔洞穴杀死26只怪物，获取大量功勋

2.name: 除魔
2.des: 前往玛雅神庙杀死26只怪物，获取大量功勋

3.name: 除魔
3.des: 前往赤月神殿杀死26只怪物，获取大量功勋

4.name: 除魔
4.des: 前往死亡深渊杀死26只怪物，获取大量功勋

100.name: The Start
100.text_tgt: Click the [r【Submit】] button below to submit the task

101.name: Equipment
101.text_tgt: Click the [r【Role】] button below, and find [Stick] and [Goblin Armor] in the Equipment grid. Put them on, you can resist the monsters outside!

102.name: Take the first step
102.text_tgt: Go to the [r【Map】] page, click on the [b【Outside the Valley】] in the middle of the interface. After the progress is over, you will go Outside the Valley

103.name: First Battle
103.text_tgt: After entering [b【Outside the Valley】], you will fight automatically, please defeat 5 monsters!

104.name: Recycle Equipment
104.text_tgt: Recycle equipment in your [r【Bag】], click [b【Recycle】] at the bottom to recycle the equipments you don't need. Also, you can go to [r【Settings】], set up your [Automatic Recycling] options. Pay attention to the specific details of the options, and do not set the wrong device to cause the required equipment to be recycled.

105.name: Set automatic recycling
105.text_tgt: Enter the [r【Settings】] page, click the [r【Automatic Recycling】] setting button on the left, and set according to your needs

106.name: Forward
106.text_tgt: At [b【Outside the Valley】], continue to go up and enter [r【Divinity's Reach South】]. Go up and enter [r【Divinity's Reach】] [b (If the battle power is not enough, it is recommended to destroy more monsters to obtain better quality equipment)]

107.name: Strengthen
107.text_tgt: Close the [r【Map】] and enter the [r【Role】] page then click the [r【Strengthening】] button below to strengthen any positions 5 times . Not only will the equipment provide battle power, but the enhancement will also greatly increase your battle power, come and try!

108.name: Journey
108.text_tgt: Pay attention to the route: [b【Divinity's Reach】]->[Divinity's Reach North]->[Orc Dungeon 1st Floor]->[Orc Dungeon 2nd Floor]->[r【Orc Dungeon 3rd Floor】]

109.name: Hunt Ⅰ
109.text_tgt: Be careful！The monster leader is in [b【Orc Dungeon 3rd Floor】], use your strength to defeat it!

110.name: Explore
110.target_content: Go to the Goblin Cave 1st Floor
110.text_tgt: Pay attention to the route: [b【Divinity's Reach】]->[Divinity's Reach North]->[r【Goblin Cave 1st Floor】]

111.name: Hunt Ⅱ
111.text_tgt: Go to the front [r【Goblin Chief's Cave】], use your strength to defeat it!

112.name: Go Deep
112.text_tgt: Note the route: [b【Divinity's Reach】]->[Divinity's Reach West]->[r【Fraud Forest】]

113.name: Hunt Ⅲ
113.text_tgt: Pay attention to the route: [b【Fraud Forest】]->[Thorns Maze]->[Elven Ruins]->[r【Green Dragon Lair】], use your strength to defeat it!

114.name: A good fame keeps its luster in the dark
114.text_tgt: Go to the [rRole] page and click the [rFame] button below.When you reach Fame Level 1，you will be blessed and the equipment drop rate will increase!

115.name: Hunt Ⅳ
115.text_tgt: Pay attention to the route: [b【Divinity's Reach】]->[Divinity's Reach East]->[Gnoll Tribe]->[r【Way of the Brave】], use your strength to defeat it!

116.name: The path to glory is always rugged
116.text_tgt: Through [b【Way of the Brave】], [r【Mercenary Station】] is ahead.

117.name: Hunt Ⅴ
117.text_tgt: Pay attention to the route: [b【Mercenary Station】]->[Dark City]->[Dark Cliffs]->[r【Desperate Tower】], use your strength to defeat it!

118.name: Hunt Ⅵ
118.text_tgt: Pay attention to the route: [b【Mercenary Station】]->[Dark City]->[Dark Cliffs]->[Desperate Tower]->[Slave Prison]->[r【Forgotten City】], use your strength to defeat it!

119.name: Hunt Ⅷ
119.text_tgt: Pay attention to the route: [b【Mercenary Station】]->[Snaker Ruins]->[Snaker Ruins 1st Floor]->[Snaker Ruins 2nd Floor]->[r【Snaker Ruins 3rd Floor】], use your strength to defeat it!

120.name: New Danger
120.text_tgt: Note the route: [b【Divinity's Reach】]->[Divinity's Reach West]->[Fraud Forest]->[r【Murloc Coast】]

121.name: Hunt Ⅶ
121.text_tgt: Pay attention to the route: [b【Murloc Coast】]->[Murloc Bay]->[r【Murloc Island】], use your strength to defeat it!

122.name: Hunt Ⅸ
122.text_tgt: Pay attention to the route: [b【Mercenary Station】]->[Snaker Ruins]->[Snaker Ruins 1st Floor]->[...]->[r【Snaker Ruins 7th Floor】], use your strength to defeat it!

123.name: Hunt Ⅹ
123.text_tgt: Pay attention to the route: [b【Mercenary Station】]->[Lost City]->[Troll Cave]->[Troll Cave 1st Floor]->[...]->[r【Troll Altar】], use your strength to defeat it!

124.name: Border
124.text_tgt: Pay attention to the route: [b【Divinity's Reach】]->[Divinity's Reach West]->[Fraud Forest]->[r【Silvermoon City】]

125.name: Hunt Ⅺ
125.text_tgt: Pay attention to the route: [b【Silvermoon City】]->[Kobold Canyon]->[Slivermoon Forest]->[r【Mithril Pit】], use your strength to defeat it!

126.name: Hunt Ⅻ
126.text_tgt: Pay attention to the route: [b【Silvermoon City】]->[Kobold Canyon]->[Slivermoon Forest]->[Elf Outpost]->[Secret Tunnel]->[r【Kobold Altar】], use your strength to defeat it!

127.name: Hunt XIII
127.text_tgt: Pay attention to the route: [b【Silvermoon City】]->[Kobold Canyon]->[Slivermoon Forest]->[Elf Outpost]->[Secret Tunnel]->[r【Kobold Lair】], use your strength to defeat it!

128.name: Set Off
128.text_tgt: Pay attention to the route: [b【Divinity's Reach】]->[Divinity's Reach North]->[r【Orc Dungeon 1st Floor】]

129.name: A Gift
129.text_tgt: Click the [r【Bag】] button below, find [o【Pack (Lv.8)】] in the backpack and use it to get rich rewards!

130.name: Practice makes perfect
130.text_tgt: Click the [r【Bag】] button below, find [b【{@1:}】] in the backpack and use it to acquire new skills.

131.name: No way is impossible to courage
131.text_tgt: Pay attention to the route: In the city of [b【Mercenary Station】], find [rVeteran] at the top, chat with him and click [b【Go Pirate Isle】,you will find Dangerous island]

132.name: Explore the Isle
132.text_tgt: After entering [b【Pirate Isle South】], you will fight automatically, Please defeat 10 monsters!
